person.persName: John Houston Jr. (McLean County, Kentucky, farmer and slaveholder.)

body.p: McLean County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John Houston Sr. and Mary Magdalena Shoemaker Houston. Married to Gillie Bodine Leachman Houston in Daviess County, Kentucky, on September 28, 1848. Father of Mary S. Houston, Matilda F. Houston, Elizabeth M. Houston, John R. Houston, Ida C. Houston, Sarah Z. Houston, Josephine Houston, and Ora L. Houston Ayer. Farmer in Daviess County in 1850. Farmer in McLean County in 1860. Employed John Houston as a farm laborer in McLean County in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in McLean County in 1860.
